column1: The South Road was a major road of Gondor.
A road ran from Pelargir to the north
column2: crossed Erui at the Crossings of Erui and reached Minas Tirith through the Rammas Echor.The name "South Road" is used only by Bergil; the road that could be "the South Road" is unnamed on the map
column3: however the context of the narrative makes this identification obvious. Cf.

column1: During the War of the Ring
column3: captains of the Southern Fiefs were expected along the South Road.
